doc.title: Women in Horseracing: The Bettye Gabriel Story
doc.plot: A female perspective on thoroughbred horseracing, as seen through the eyes of the first recipient of the "Distinguished Women in Horseracing Award" and seasoned horse trainer, Bettye Gabriel. In this one hour documentary, meet the upbeat and engaging Bettye Gabriel along with other women trailblazers who persevered in the male dominated horseracing industry.
